name: Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel & Spa
address: 12 Nguyen Du, Cẩm Phô, Hội An, Việt Nam
description:
Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel & Spa có xe đạp miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục và khu vườn ở Hội An. Ngoài dịch vụ phòng, chỗ nghỉ này còn có nhà hàng và sân hiên để phục vụ du khách. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, phòng chờ chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel & Spa, tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Á mỗi sáng.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, khách sạn 4 sao này có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Chùa Cầu, Bảo tàng lịch sử Hội An và Hội Quán Chi Hội Triều Châu Trung Quốc. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel & Spa 29 km.

review.rating: PERFECT HOTEL IN LALUNA HOTEL HOI AN
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely love and satisfied with  our stay in this Fantastic Hotel. 
Everything is new,  spotless and at the perfect condition. 
The Meals that we had were incredible with the variety of both Local Foods and Western foods. 
Supper Friendly and Helpful Staff,  they went out from their way to make sure that we have an absolute stay. 
Services are also stand out with affordable prices.
On our trip, We were surprised and admired the giant efforts of Hoi An local people in terms of maintaining the safety area in the pandemic time for travellers with tranquil, attractive old city and every services that we had were all at the low cost. 
We highly recommend this Elegant Hotel .  We will definitely come back this Hotel in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a wonderful location. You can see the old town from the front porch yet it is far enough away to be removed from the noise and evening crowds.  We enjoyed happy hour by the pool each evening and the breakfast in the morning had many options. Our room was spacious and had a great view of the canal. Every staff member we met was helpful and friendly.  Nancy at the front desk was especially friendly and professional.  She helped us arrange a taxi to dinner on the beach one evening when we were having trouble with our grab app and was always there to lend a helping hand.

review.rating: Overall was ok. Except if it’s the monsoon season
review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Location is excellent and convenient. Very near to Old Town Hoi An
review.comment_negative:
The room we booked which was a suite was not maintained well. There was a heavy rainfall when we were there, and rainwater came through the sliding door and the floor was soaking wet and the bed was wet too. The bathroom drainage was clogged and the entire room smelled like sewage. We had to ask to move to another room as the smell was so bad and our bed was wet.

There was only 1 staff on duty and he had to run up n down looking for cloth to soak up the water on the floor. 

The shower door couldn’t close properly and every time we took a shower our bathroom floor will be filled with water. The hotel could have maintained the suite room better. We were disappointed with the way the staff handled the situation as I’m sure this isn’t the first time it happened.

review.rating: Great hotel, perfect location, all amenities.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The hotel is perfectly located at the entrance to the old section of town.  The rooms are nice most with balconies and many with river views. We had a rear room which was smaller than the larger rooms facing the river which were sold out. Fixtures, lighting and amenities are first class.  Our room was in the rear with a wide sliding door.  Beds are comfy and room has tons of light.  Breakfast buffet was terrific and there was no rush to get you out.  Staff were awesome and the restaurant had a nice outdoor sitting area right on the river.  Free bikes for great use and decent wifi.
review.comment_negative: I wanted a quiet room and the river front rooms were full.  We had a nice room on the third floor overlooking the pool, nice but on the small side. Very quiet : )  The pool is nice but small.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten einen wunderschönen 4- tägigen Aufenthalt im Laluna Riverside Hotel und waren ganz traurig, dass wir wieder abreisen mussten. Das Hotel ist sehr gut gelegen, direkt beim Night market. Man kann zu Fuß alles gut erreichen oder man nimmt sich ein Rad, was auch beim Zimmer inkludiert war. Das Personal im Hotel ist extrem freundlich, Service wird hier groß geschrieben.
Wir fanden auch den Pool sehr schön, eine kühle Erfrischung nach einem Sightseeing Tag war sehr angenehm. Auch der Spa und die Massagen im Hotel waren sehr gut.

review.comment_positive: Very clean, great location staff were very friendly and always there to help. The breakfast was the best during my 2 weeks in Vietnam. So much variety.

review.rating: Overall, the hotel's excellent service and prime location by the river make it a great choice for travelers seeking
review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is conveniently located just 500 meters from the bustling Old Quarter and major tourist attractions.

The hotel offers complimentary bicycles, which are a fantastic alternative for exploring the area.

We stayed in the King Suite located on the top floor. The room is decent size with charming antique décor.

The hotel staff are always smiling and greeting, ready to help including the Chef, server, coordinator
review.comment_negative:
The distance even though 500m can be challenging to navigate on foot in the scorching heat. 

The room on top floor  tends to get quite warm during the summer. The air conditioning takes a couple of hours to effectively cool the room, which is a slight inconvenience.

review.comment_positive: great location, easy to walk (or use hotel’s bicycle service) to the ancient town where they have night market and it is quiet during the night so it is good for rest.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
The property staff was warm and understanding. They had mixed up our room category but they acknowledged and compensated in a manner where one could tell they really regretted making a mistake. They provided us Free SPA facilities and a 50 percent discount on taxi which exceed the cost of the room to show us how much service meant to them. Han you were fantastic !! Will always remember you. 

I also forgot my AirPods at the property and they couriered it to me to Hanoi. They did not charge me for the same. This was my fault but they were exceptionally service oriented. Thank you Laluna management truly appreciate the warmth and support during the stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Everything was fabulous: the locations is great, by the river, 2 steps from the old quarter, we had a room with a river view and balcony, that was exceptional. The breakfast was variate, fresh, and very tasty. We also had dinner at the restaurant and the food was also great.
Last, but not least, the people working there are wonderful: kind, helpful and so lovely. We miss you and thank you so much for everything! 
We also booked a driver and did an excursion to My Son organised by the hotel. Everything was so perfect. Good recommendations for activities, restaurants and Taylor. We cannot recommend enough.
review.comment_negative: We had to leave.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: 川辺で、観光の中心地に近いながらも程良く離れていて、静かに過ごすことが出来た。スタッフの対応や目配りは大変気持ち良かった。古い建築物を改装したものと思われるが、新しい機能や美しさの表現に工夫がなされており、気持ちの良い空間を演出している。ナイトマーケットの中心まで歩いて10分。朝の川辺や対岸のお店を眺めるのも気持ちが良い。また、機会があったら滞在したいと思う。
review.comment_negative:
併設のレストラン：メニューに載っている大好きなラムチョップを食べに入ったら在庫がなった。代わりに注文したリブアイステーキは硬かった。グラスワインの赤に世界標準的なカベルネソービニオンも入れて欲しい。
エレベーター：3階まで。景色の良い4階の部屋から荷物を運ぶのが大変。チェックインの時は運んでもらえるが。
チェアー：ロビーや部屋の木製の椅子の座面が滑りやすくクッションが動いて座りにくい。滑り止めが必要。

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Property is centrally located in Hoi An but still in a quiet area away from the hustle and bustle of the core. Can easily walk everywhere. The room was clean and nice. The staff were exceptional.  Very friendly and very helpful. They gave us suggestions on where to eat, where to get tailored clothes, help set up tours and transport and so much more. Could not have asked for more.

review.comment_positive:
- camera molto bella , spaziosa , pulita e doccia con buona pressione .
- una mappa e delle bici gratuite per girare . 
- buona posizione .
review.comment_negative:
- colazione 90% salata tipo spaghetti di riso , bacon , uova …. con il finto “ chef” di 20 anni con il cappello che sta lì solo a fare uova strapazzate . in posti in cui ho pagato meno c era molta più scelta per una colazione zuccherata..
- in 5 città girate mai un pizzico di zanzara  perché stavano tutte dentro quella camera , otto pizzichi in una notte , 5 zanzare uccise e non erano ancora finite , notte insonne dal ronzio e dal prurito . 
- tre luci sul balcone che non si possono spegnere , bella la vista sul canale ma sarebbe ancora più bello poterla vedere dal letto di notte  ma si è obbligati a dormire con la tenda chiusa altrimenti con le luci del balcone c è troppa luce in camera . 
- rapporto qualità prezzo veramente esagerato 
per il prezzo pagato e le recensioni viste credevo molto meglio .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: very well located. comfortable rooms

review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: 私は４階に２部屋しかない60m2の部屋に泊まっていました。部屋は広く、バルコニーからリバーが眺めることができて、とても快適でした。
review.comment_negative:
シャワーの量が少なかった。
それと、シャワールームにあったシャワージェルの容器の蓋がしっかりと固定されていなくて、私が上の金属部分(プッシュしてジェルを排出する部分)を持ち上げたところ、下の容器(陶器)が床に落下し、破れてしまいました。このことをチェックアウトの際に伝えると、150,000ドン(約860円)を弁償させられました。
日本とベトナムの文化の違いでしょうが、蓋がキッチリと閉まって無かったの原因なのに、アホくさいです。日本のようにプラスチックボトルに変更すれぼ良い。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: the staff and hotel are amazing. Nancy and mrs Thuy was extremely helpful with my stay thank you so much. I would highly recommend staying here when in Hoi An.

review.rating: 10/10. We loved this hotel and will recommend it to others.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is beautiful, comfortable, fantastic breakfast, in room dining. We loved the staff the most. They were always smiling and saying hello. They were attentive and went out of their way for us. Bike hire was free and there was a bike with a child seat - bonus for us. It’s easy to walk and cycle everywhere. It was close to the night market. We had fun swimming in the pool.
review.comment_negative: I cannot fault this place, other than the pool area with tiled flooring gets very slippery when wet. My husband slipped and fell.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Perfect location. Amazing staff who were so eager and helpful to plan our day out without overcharging us on anything. Event the airport drop cab was given at standard cost. Best part was when one of the staff came out of the property to see us off. Great hospitality.

review.comment_positive: staffs are very helpful, breakfast are good to enjoy.  We ate lunch at the hotel resturant and the chef is good at both western and Vietnamese style.  We had a good time eating and chatting with the cool air-con on.  The staffs were also helping to set-up a surprise birthday surprise for my friend.  We had a good time in Laluna.  The location is good, just 5-8 mins walk to the old town.  You can either walk or cycling to the old town as well as go nearby resturants.
review.comment_negative: The free bicycles are seriously too old and heavy, I tried to ride on for 250m and then I gave up and returned it back.  Even my friends who is skilful on cycling, they think the bicycles should be renewed.

review.rating: Value for money and truly great hospitality!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive:
The location of the establishment is near to Hoi An heritage core area, within walking distance. Absolutely convenient for anyone to head down to Hoi An heritage core area on foot. The area is safe and well kept, very convenient.

Breakfast is awesome, with variety of choices to choose from, not to mention good coffee was available.

Room is big and great. I opted for quiet room and it had certainly checked all the boxes. Hotel services were amazing. I asked for extra water, towels and many more requests, all of which were met without hesitations. 

Upon check out, staff were kind enough to present me some souvenirs before I depart.
review.comment_negative: If I could point out one thing that I dislike is the halfway towards my room. Energy conserving light bulbs were installed and will light up when one arrives at the hallway. However, the lights would not light up as fast as I have arrived at the hallway and most of the time the hallway was dark and I almost tripped while walking a few times before the hallway was lit up with lights moments later. I suggest important areas of the hallways should always have permanent lighting in place at night.

review.comment_positive: The property was lovely. Nice, spacious room, clean facilities, kind, helpful staff, and great pool. The breakfast was delicious as well as the drinks and dinner I had at the property. Great location where it’s a bit quieter but a short walk to old town.

review.rating: Good small hotel. well located for old town.
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Small hotel next to the river, about 400m from the centre of the old town. Big choice of food on the breakfast buffet.
Got picked up by hotel car on arrival at airport [cost $20, arranged by email a week before arriving]. We used the hotel car to go to Ba Na Hills, cost 1400000 dong [about 44GBP] but that was car only, entry extra. Car waited while we were there.
Make sure you have sorted your visa out before you travel, it wasn't clear if you could get a 'visa on arrival' at Danang Airport, I had an e-visa {not straightforward to apply for] but it was the first thing the Imm. Officer asked for.
Use the GRAB taxis to get around [cheap and accessed by phone app]. The Japanese Bridge is being totally renovated and is shrouded in a barn like structure.
review.comment_negative:
The pool is small but adequate, it's just short on outside space [i.e. sunbeds]. We only went there on 1 afternoon of 4.
Shower nozzle squirted everywhere [I didn't use the overhead shower], & cubicle didn't contain the water so floor was wet after every shower. You need to have the air con at 22 to make the room cool to sleep in as duvet is too thick. Security box hadn't been screwed into the wardrobe [?].

Best of all, the amazing hostess was so kind and helpful, guiding us on the best food spots and shopping spots and always greeted us with a warm smile.
review.comment_negative: The only thing I could fault is that the walls were thin and we had some very noisy neighbours that kept us awake one night. Everything else was great

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: Vom Zimmer, über den Pool, bis zum Buffet war alles äußerst zufriedenstellend! Heraus stach der Service, wir wurden mit allem sehr gut beraten (Essen gehen, Buchung von Fahrten, usw.). Ein weiteres Highlight sind die kostenfrei zur Verfügung stehenden Räder - eines davon mit Kindersitz! Alles war sauber!
review.comment_negative: „nicht gefallen“ kann man nicht sagen. Hier und da könnte man die alte Ausstattung in den Zimmern gegen neue ersetzen. Während unseres Aufenthalts wurde dies im Außenbereich getan. Die Anlage wirkt also trotzdem sehr gepflegt!

review.room_type: Phòng Luxury Giường đôi với Ban công và Tầm nhìn ra Sông
review.comment_positive: During our travel to Vietnam, we visited HoiAn three times. But, the time we stayed at Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel & Spa was most memorable because our stay there was made a  difference by the extraordinary service provided by Nancy who was not only really friendly and helpful, but also went that extra step. She not only placed in our room a beautiful vase of flowers from the hotel’s garden but also spread rose petals on and around the bed to make sure our stay was so extra welcomed. And, the effort she went into organizing a spa session at the last minute was just incredible. If you are in HoiAn, this is the place to stay.

review.rating: We enjoyed our stay at such a friendly staffed hotel

The staff were very attentive to our needs and made good suggestions on particular shops to visit.
review.comment_negative: The tour operator suggested by the hotel didn't have an English speaking guide to accompany us. The hotel should link up with tour operators who have English speaking guides.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: If I ever come back to Hoi An, I would surely like to stay in Laluna Riverside Hotel. It has the greatest privilege of being so close from the center of town yet away from the excessive hustle and bustle of shops and restaurants. Breakfast had a good variety and the room was cozy and comfortable. I truly loved the green areas and the layout of the hotel. All the staff were so accommodating, helpful and very pleasant to deal with especially Chau and Nancy. I would particularly like to thank the VERY efficient Truc Trinh for all her communication and services prior to my arrival. I made sure to meet her and thank her in person when I arrived on the premises.
review.comment_negative: My experience at the spa was average. It could surely improve. The incident that totally put me off was that my masseuse (after my full body massage) kept huffing and puffing and showed obvious sign of anger because I did not give her a tip. I just assume that a tip is given (happily) when the customer is satisfied with the service. I SIMPLY WAS NOT.

The reception staff were ever friendly and helpful. They were always ready to greet us every time we met. And it went beyond just the polite greeting. They were genuine in listening to us and offered advice or help. It was very different to the 5-star hotel we stayed in Danang.
I would like to specially mention Mr Nam who went the extra mile to ensure our stay was comfortable. Ms Nancy also ensured that our check-out was smooth.
Thank you all for making our stay in Hoi An memorable.

review.room_type: Phòng Luxury Giường đôi với Ban công và Tầm nhìn ra Sông
review.comment_positive: It was quiet, best breakfast we’ve had, one of the more comfortable beds. Really nice touches and clean rooms. Hotel looks better than pictures in person. Staff was insanely accommodating, you can feel they really want you to have a good impression. The let us leave our luggage there on a day we weren’t even staying with them but had to stop in Hoi an. Refused to let us even carry our own  luggage to the cars. Great service and great value. If people complain in reviews I would suggest reading between the lines and taking their own nitpicky needs into account with their judgements. lol
review.comment_negative: I don’t have anything that immediately comes to mind but there were other more affordable hotels around, I just can’t account for if the service was as good at the more affordable places.

I would definitely recommend Laluna Hoi An.

review.rating: Great hotel and staff in Hoi An

review.comment_positive:

Breakfast was delicious.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, vị trí đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Nếu có cơ hội sẽ quay lại đây nghỉ dưỡng 💋

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: Todo. La ubicación (a la entrada del old town, a la orilla del río pero sin ruidos),la decoración, la atención del personal, el espectacular desayuno (variadísimo, exquisito, hasta los huevos eran sabrosos), la tranquilidad (después de no encontrarla en casi ningún hotel del país) y la excelente relación calidad-precio. Un hallazgo. De hecho, hasta prolongamos la estancia inicialmente prevista. Después de 15 días recorriendo el norte cargamos pilas y nos daba pena marchar. Hasta nos hicimos un masaje fabuloso. El personal es encantador pero sin llegar a agobiarte, te organizan si quieres excursiones, desplazamientos, el taxi a la playa, te recomiendan sastrerías, etc. En fin, una gozada. Y para rematar nos hicieron un regalo de despedida. Sin duda, y llevamos dos semanas de viaje, el mejor alojamiento con enorme diferencia y paradójicamente, no el que más nos ha costado.
review.comment_negative: Nada.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Highly recommend this hotel. Nothing to fault at all.
Breakfast was the best we have had since travelling and staying in many hotels. The rooms were spacious, clean, comfy beds. Great view from room balcony. The staff were lovely and knew our names. We were treated like royalty. Nancy and Nam were particularly helpful and lovely, even waved us off when we left.
Great location. Great information when we arrived from Nancy. All information we could need about excursions and we booked a few through the hotel. 
Easy to book hotel taxis. 
Overall would highly highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

Breakfast- A good spread with delicious local food and some other options as well.

Room- The room was a bit too small. 

Facilities - The hotel has complementary bicycles and there's one with a child seat too.

Un encanto el personal, punto muy a valorar en su favor, pero en consonancia a la población de Vietnam.

review.comment_positive:
Great location. Staff really helpful. My wife got sick and had to be hospitalised. We had to extend our stay. They let me stay the extra nights free of charge while my wife was in hospital. They expressed genuine concern for her health and helped tremendously in our dealings with the hospital.

review.comment_positive:
-El desayuno es el mejor, mas variado y completo de todos los sitios en el que nos alojamos a lo largo de nuestro viaje.

-El personal amable, atento, resolutivo y siempre dispuesto a darte consejos e indicaciones de donde encontrar los mejores servicios. A parte de esto, el nivel medio de inglés de los compañeros de recepción es bastante más alto que el resto de estancias de Vietnam en las que estuvimos. 

-Habitación + baño limpísimos y amplios.

-Hotel bastante bonito, sobretodo una vez cae la noche.
review.comment_negative: -Al ser un hotel que las habitaciones dan pared con pared, si tienes la mala suerte que te toque una familia especialmente ruidosa y con niños (como a nosotros) puede fastidiarte el descanso o la desconexión. Pero bueno, la falta de sentído común de la gente no puede ser gestionada por un hotel.

Quite a distance walk to the old town especially on a hot and humid day. The wall of the hotel is so thin - you could easily heard people talking, taking a shower next door. I was waken up by the sound next door on the first night at 3am. The staff was kind enough to arrange for a room change the next day.
The breakfast quality was average. I skipped my hotel breakfast on my last 2 days.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in an amazing location

review.comment_positive:
We stayed in the suite on the 4th floor and it was stunning, everything we could expect from a beautiful hotel like Laluna.

We can not thank Mr Nam enough for his fantastic support and how he made our stay so wonderful.

The room was spacious, comfortable and had all amenities needed for our short break.

The pool was a much needed chill out space with adequate seating, shade and towels.

We would highly recommend staying here!

review.comment_positive: location, friendliness of staff, very helpful.  room was very clean and comfortable.  breakfast was delicious
review.comment_negative: nothing, everything was great

review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The overall experience was great. We had a suite on the 4th floor that was large, quaint and had a nice view of the river. Although there were so many things I liked about the property, the best was the service. No matter what I needed the manager and staff made it happen.   Also need to mention that the spa treatments we received were great and  priced so reasonably. The breakfast was also very good.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 giường đơn với ban công
review.comment_positive: Laluna has very good location. It is located at a quiet area facing the river but near to the old town within 8-10  mins walking distance.  The room is spacious and clean with good air-conditioning.  The hotel provides free bicycles so we went cycling around the old town. Ms Dung of the sales department was helpful and responsive to my enquiries before I came, and Ms Nancy, the receptionist, was pleasant and fast in processing my check-in. She also answered any questions I had during my stay. If I need to write an adverse comment about the hotel, I would say it is the extremely small swimming pool. However, it didn't affect me because I didn't swim at the hotel.
review.comment_negative: For the price I paid, I did not have anything I didn't like.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: Ruime kamer en fijn bed. De heren bij de entree van het hotel waren enorm vriendelijk en behulpzaam, o.a. bij het uitlenen van de fietsen en een handje hulp met de bagage. Zwembad prettig met frisse handdoeken. Service with a smile.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối Với Phòng Tắm - Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The Location is Great, the Reception girl very nice, she told us many things to do in Hoi An. Thx to her... Forgot her name. She so Kind to every person. The room is just good to our Family, Everything was great.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: Friendly receptionist Nancy and staff, great breakfast and clean hotel
review.comment_negative: Bar closes too early

review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Staff were wonderful, very accommodating, particularly Nancy at the front desk. Hotel is very comfortable and rooms have great AC which is a must for the hotter months. Overall great, easy stay!

review.comment_positive: Gia đình tôi đã có kỳ nghỉ cũng được. Phòng có cửa sổ nhìn ra phố.

review.comment_negative: La chaleur dans les parties communes et le personnel qui veulent à chaque fois nous vendre des excursions ou déplacements

review.rating: Great location, comfortable beds, fab restaurant on site, and amazing staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Great room with a view of the river - we stayed in 305. The bed is fantastic!
The staff are superb, with a special thank you to Thao! 
The location is perfect for going around Hoi An ancient town, yet just a few minutes outside of it, so you don't have the noise around you. 
Breakfast was good, with a varied selection. No 'English Breakfast' or 'American' options, however, other great variety, appropriate for the area. 
The chefs at the restaurant are great - my husband and I ate there twice for lunch, and the food was very tasty and freshly prepared. The ladies working in the restaurant are great too, very helpful and kind. 
The room was of good size.
review.comment_negative:
We stayed in 309 the first night, however, gutter smell was coming out of the shower - very strong too. I suspect they already knew about this, as the moment we raised the issue we were told to pack and move, no questions asked or checks done - as if they were expecting us to say so. Perhaps 305 was busy during our first night. 

The hotel needs a little updating, as you can tell the FF&E is quite used and old, however, the staff more than makes up for this!

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Good view and location. Just away from the hustle and bustle but an easy short walk into Ancient Town. The room was clean and spacious and had a balcony looking over the river. The pool area was actually pretty cool and a nice relief from the midday heat. Had good WiFi there too.
review.comment_negative: Nitpick but the pool lounges were a bit on the hard uncomfortable side.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Good location, good staff, breakfast was plenty of choice. Very easy to get to all the sights.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The buffet breakfast spread is good and yummy. Location of hotel is just a short walk of 5 mins to the entrance of the ancient old town. We had room 307 facing the river. Perfect!

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The room was very clean and we had a great view to the river. The hotel provides also bikes for free. Tha hotel is located very close to the night market and the center of Hoi An. The staff that work there are very willing to help you with everything and they smile all the time! We loved the guy who helped us with our luggage(olympiacos)!! Nancy and Thao also helped us with everything !! Make sure to book a round way to/from airport to get discount! Thank you guys !! Hoi An was beautiful!

review.rating: Lovely hotel in a great location.
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Great location. Walking distance to ancient/old town yet away from the noise. The rooms were spacious and clean.  The beds and linens were very comfortable and that made for a great night's sleep! We were on the 3rd floor and it was very quiet. The staff was very helpful and accommodating.  The bathrooms were very nice. Great shower and very pretty. The lighting was also good. Very nice to have an abundance of umbrellas and bikes available. We used both, and often! The breakfast was quite good and varied and eggs to order were available outside of the buffet. Thanks to the staff for a great family trip to Hoi An. We hope to come back again one day :)
review.comment_negative: The only thing that I would have liked (and I am sure it is an American thing) would have been a nice bar and a larger common area to relax outside of the room besides the small lobby. This did not deter me from enjoying the hotel but a tidbit for other travelers.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

review.comment_negative: We were in a room opposite the stairwell and it could be a little noisy at night. While the staff were really lovely, it felt a little pushy at check out to use their car service and to provide feedback.

review.comment_positive: I cannot speak more highly for this hotel. From the moment we were greeted by Ms Nancy and the other staff to the moment we left - we were treated like royalty! The hotel is absolutely beautiful and quaint with magical views of the river in front. The room was comfortable, clean and luxurious for such an exceptional price. The hotel also helped us with organising activities and we had a massage which was great. I cannot recommend Laluna enough and we will certainly be staying here again upon our return to Hoi An!

Room is clean and fresh, and breakfast is diverse and delicious. I can't recommend enough, and I have to come back to Laluna during Christmas Eve.

review.rating: An Unforgettable Stay in Hoi An's Hidden Gem

review.comment_positive: The staff at Laluna Hoi An truly goes above and beyond to ensure your stay is perfect. They are warm, welcoming, and always ready to assist with a genuine smile. review.comment_positive:
We had a fantastic stay at Laluna whilst visiting Hoi An. The hotel is exactly as described and the pictures don't do it justice! Our river view room was beautiful with great views and extremely comfortable.

All the staff were super friendly and could not do enough to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. Hopefully when you stay you will be greeted by Nam, the hotel manager. Nam was so friendly and made us feel right at home as soon as we arrived. Nam made sure we had everything we wanted and his enthusiasm and delightful demeanor were a particular highlight of our stay. Thank you Nam for making our stay so memorable and we hope we can stay with you again in future.

review.rating: Overall I would give this 11/10 if I could!
review.room_type: Phòng Luxury Giường đôi với Ban công và Tầm nhìn ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic spot near the Hoi An Old Quarter. Perfect for a romantic get away to see all the Hoi An sites and famous Lanterns!

We stayed for 3 nights and were greeted by the marvellous Nam Thau who was very helpful in booking things that we wanted to do. He went above and beyond to ensure we were well looked after and nothing was too much of an issue for him.

The room we had was amazing. We had a balcony overlooking the river and the room was huge. It was all very clean and had everything we needed.

The hotel had a fantastic swimming pool for when we wanted to relax, with a bar serving great cocktails and food.

Breakfast was some of the best i’ve had in Vietnam. Great complimentary breakfast drink selection (iced coffees especially!). And the range of food options was good with the options changing each day.

Overall I would give this 11/10 if I could!
review.comment_negative: Only thing a little annoying, is having to put your room key in a slot on the wall to turn on the electrics.

review.comment_positive:
We spent 12 wonderful days at this exceptional hotel . Our room looked out onto the river and was very  comfortable and clean . It was an easy 10 minute walk to the fascinating Old Town .
We enjoyed Happy Hour on the terrace  and meals in the restaurant but did not try the pool .
The absolutely best thing about this hotel is the staff who all work so hard to make sure your holiday is perfect . From the General Manager to the housekeeping staff we could not have been made more welcome . Thank you so much to all the staff . It seems unfair to name one or two because they all deserve our praise and thanks .
Being there for the Christmas celebrations was great fun and very well done. We hope to see you all again .
If you are going to Hoi An stay at LaLuna , you will not be disappointed .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn

review.rating: Ruined laundry, emotional blackmail & insulting my intelligence to get out of giving proper compensa
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: The historic town is only a short walk away, which was great. The pool was nice for a post-exploring dip. The room was mostly fine, as was breakfast.
review.comment_negative:
A number of things were not as pleasant. One of the staff kept coming up to us multiple times in the morning hoping to upsell things like massages, getting clothes made and day trips. We just wanted to be left alone and eat our breakfast.

They also ignored my laundry instructions and shrunk some of my clothes, insulting my intelligence to boot when I came to complain. I have a bunch of Smartwool merino clothes (expensive but does what the clothes say on the label), which need to be washed at 30 degrees Celsius and not machine dried. I gave the instructions while 3 members of staff were listening to me. They told me laundry could take 48h to be returned if it had to be air-dried, which I was fine with. So when I got it back less than 10h later, I was suspicious about whether washing instructions were followed and checked the clothes that were washed vs the same that weren't washed. They had shrunk 4cm and thus became unwearable. When I went to complain, the staff said it was because it was air-dried in the sun and the temperature had been more than 30 degrees that day. I'm sorry but by that logic, we can't wear these clothes while sweating as they would shrink from our body temperature. There was plenty of emotional blackmail ("The cleaning lady will personally compensate you.") and ridiculous compensation offers (laundry would be free + a £4 taxi ride and such, while the underwear is worth £30 per piece), honestly, it was insulting. In the end they offered to pay back half of the cost of the pieces ruined. I was so tired at that point that I just wanted to go back to my room and not deal with them anymore.

Otherwise, even though we didn't have a view of the pool, it was quite loud when people were having a swim.

review.rating: Hotel has a nice view of Thu Bon river.  Good breakfast.  Beautiful background music in the dining room.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: The staff are so friendly and helpful.  On checking out my sister in law found out that she misplaced her visa, passport and her ID. The staff went extra miles to find them under her bed!   You can imagine how relieve we felt.  Thanks so much Laluna staff.

We had a great view of the river and a large shower. The room was clean and lacked nothing. The pool area was also very nice and clean with free pool towels. We also booked the transfers through the hotel. These went very smoothly and communication was quick and easy.

The best part of the hotel was the staff, who were incredibly friendly and helpful. Airport pick-up and drop-off was reasonably priced and efficient.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel could not have been better for my partner and I who were travelling Hoi An for a few days. Mr Nam and his team of staff were really welcoming and helped us with everything, carried out luggage to and from taxis, provided umbrellas when it rained, suggested transport and tour options. 

Our aircon in our room stopped working one night but the staff were able to immediately provide a temporary AC unit in that evening and then fixed the room one by the next day. 

The spa and pool were both really comfortable and relaxing. Lots of food and drink options at the restaurant and bar. 

Could not recommend this place enough.

review.comment_positive: Hotel staff were attentive and helpful, resulting in a highly personalised service. Nancy, in particular, went beyond her call of duty to ensure that our stay was as comfortable as possible. It was my friend and I’s birthdays the 2 nights we stayed at Laluna and Nancy and her colleagues arranged a thoughtful gift for us - an obligatory birthday cake! We were definitely pleasantly surprised and touched by their kind gesture. Overall, we highly recommend Laluna to travellers who are looking for a relaxing retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. The hotel is also only a 7 minute walk to the Old Town. The service from each hotel staff (reception, security guard, restaurant) is the icing on the cake.

Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We couldn’t fault the property and what made our stay all the more pleasurable was the wonderful staff of Joe the Manager, Nancy, Chau, Nam and Hana. Those were the most notable but everyone else was genuinely friendly and helpful. The hotel was slightly further away from the frenetic action than many others but as we came to realise, Hoi An is not the quiet, sleepy little town we visited 10 years ago and it was a relief after a long night at the markets and the centre of action to be getting closer and closer out of the noisy end of town. It’s very nice sitting peacefully on the balcony overlooking the river and letting the swarms of Chinese tourists and off key Karaoke singers do their thing without impinging on us lovers of silence. To us, Laluna was the perfect Hotel for our preferences and would stay here again in a heartbeat. We are looking forward to planning our next holiday here and extending our stay to 10 days.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing could comment on that detracted from our stay at Laluna.

review.comment_positive: This is a lovely property located opposite the canal, just on the edge of the markets in the old quarter. The room was spacious and clean. Whilst the pool was quite small, it was very sheltered and had an adjacent bar where you could get drinks and light meals (which were delicious). The breakfasts were great where you had a choice of western and Vietnamese food. However, it was the staff that made this a memorable stay. Special thanks to Nancy, Nam, Chau, Dat, Danh, Thao and Mr Thanh who made us feel at home

Friendly staff
Good position 
Clean room
review.comment_negative:
I have to be honest - we were disappointed. The online reviews rave about this place and it is marketed as a four star hotel, so perhaps we had unrealistically high expectations. We have been travelling through Vietnam for three weeks and we had five star hotels that were cheaper than this. I would suggest this is a three star at best - so if your expectations are realistic, it's fine. 
Paper thin walls meant we were kept awake by the neighbouring room's tv. The pool was the biggest disappointment. Too small to service the number of guests, over chlorinated and the wicker sun loungers had no cushions so it was not comfortable to lounge around.

review.comment_positive:
2泊の滞在で、チェックインから滞在中、そしてチェックアウトまで全スタッフが暖かく優しく対応してくれた。
前日の夜の急なアクティビティの申し込みにも素早く対応してくれた。アクティビティ参加当日もフレキシブルに時間変更してくれて、無駄に時間を余らす事無く楽しめた。
チェックアウト日が旦那の誕生日だったのですがケーキを準備してくださって、部屋まで持ってきてくれた。特にスタッフのナムさんは休日にもかかわらず、わざわざ私達の為にホテルに来て旦那の誕生日を祝ってくれた。
本当に素晴らしいホテルとスタッフの方々でした。ありがとうございました。

review.comment_positive:
Unforgettable Stay at Laluna Riverside Hotel – A True Gem in Vietnam!

Review: From the moment I arrived at Laluna Riverside Hotel, I knew I was in for a special treat. The location is perfect, nestled right by the river, offering serene views and a peaceful ambiance. The beds were incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep after days spent exploring the vibrant surroundings.

The staff at Laluna are truly the heart of the hotel. Nam, Thanh, Thao, Hanna, and Chau made every interaction delightful with their warm smiles and eagerness to help. A special thanks to Nancy, whose kindness and care were simply beyond compare, making us feel cherished throughout our stay.

The massage therapists, Dao and Tho, provided such lovely massages that were both rejuvenating and relaxing, a perfect way to unwind.

And then there were the breakfasts – absolutely stunning! Easily the best we had in Vietnam, with a variety of delicious, fresh options to start the day right. Coupled with the friendliest staff I've encountered across Vietnam, every morning felt like a new treat.

I can't recommend Laluna Riverside Hotel enough. If you're looking for a place where comfort meets exceptional service, this is the spot. Thank you, Laluna, for a truly memorable stay!

We went away on holiday,

review.comment_positive:
Tutto assolutamente perfetto: camera ampia con vista sul fiume, struttura nuova, pulita e comodissima al centro, colazione super e staff fantastico. Abbiamo utilizzato il servizio lavanderia, bucato pulito e profumato. 
Lo staff della reception ineccepibile, ci hanno supportato in tutto e per tutto: prenotando i biglietti per lo spettacolo di Ha Noi Memory e quello a Le Lune (consigliatissimi), prenotando un tour con visita al mercato locale, giro in barca e cooking class (anche questo consigliatissimo) e prenotando il transfert per l'aeroporto. Bici disponibili gratuitamente per ad esempio raggiungere il mare in autonomia.

The rooms are spacious and luxurious, offering stunning views of the River. We love the hotel staff very very much. What a memorable trip!

review.comment_positive:
מלון יוקרתי, קרוב מאוד לכל הארועים והשווקים של העיר הויאן. הצוות נפלא,  קיבלנו שירות מדהים מעובדי חדר האוכל ( יצאו מגדרם כדי שנהיה מרוצים ונענו לכל הבקשות שלנו ).
ברצוני לציין את נאם מהקבלה שבזכותו השהות שלנו במלון היתה מושלמת. חגגנו יום הולדת וקיבלנו עוגה נפלאה.

review.rating: Excellent hotel in a fab location.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive:
The location of this hotel was perfect for us. It is a 10 minute walk to the busier parts of town (night market, restaurants and the boat trips). Not only that but the hotel itself is really well looked after. It is clear that the hotel is continuously investing in its facilities (they were just finishing a brand new pool bar while we were there which was great). 
All of the staff at Laluna were so kind and friendly. We particularly got on with the receptionists (including Nancy) who were so helpful and told us loads of useful information about shows, restaurants, shops and day trips. 
The breakfast had a great variety and was really good quality. We particularly enjoyed the fruit options and pastries. 
Overall we would definitely come back and will recommend Laluna to friends and family!

review.rating: Mr Nam at the front desk is an absolute king 👑
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
We were originally put in a room that I found underwhelming compared to the photo through which I booked (slightly different room), but one short conversation with Mr Nam (I believe that was his name) and he tended to all my concerns - putting us in a gorgeous river view room with a balcony, an upgrade without additional cost to ensure we were fully satisfied.

Mr Nam at the front desk is a powerhouse and worked very hard to ensure our satisfaction. We decided to extend our stay by one day, apologising for the late notice I assured him that I didn’t mind if we had to stay in a room that was smaller. He was very cheeky and surprised us by moving our bags into just the most beautiful suite I’ve ever stayed in. Completely inspiring room with a gorgeous bathroom and spacious living and sleeping areas. Gave us a discount on what was a HUGE upgrade.

We took full advantage of their free bike rental and the great location, some of my fondest memories are biking to and fro Hoi An on our explorations. The drivers here are very considerate and patient, and the ride is gorgeous.

All the staff here are so friendly and helpful. The masseuses in the spa are very skilled. The breakfast buffet was nice.
review.comment_negative: I presume that since covid the advertised 24hr restaurant, bar, and room service is unavailable, which was very unfortunate since most restaurants close at 10pm and ordering food is highly limited in Hoi An. This was the only thing that impeded my full satisfaction staying at Laluna.

review.rating: This is a good hotel, I would stay again but never accept the room 102.
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Overall this is a nice hotel, looks new, I love it from the first sight, it is located right in the heart of Hoi An old town, the room is clean, the bed is very comfortable, staff is friendly.
review.comment_negative:
I booked a room with river view and I want to say to everyone, don't ever accept the room number 102 if you want a river view. My room is 102, on the ground floor, next to the entrance, I feel like this is a "security room", because I can see everybody and in return everyone can see the whole room when I open the curtain or see me when I sit in the balcony, it is not private at all (I asked to change room but no empty room at the moment so I had to stay and close the curtain all the time).
Breakfast: I didn't try but I looks poor.

review.rating: I felt like a waking dollar sign as soon as I walked in
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: La camera e il bagno sono molto spaziosi.
review.comment_negative:
Non saprei da dove cominciare. 
Il problema più grande di questo hotel, che si può ritrovare per tutta la città è la totale pressione costante da parte di tutto il personale di venderti qualcosa. 
Detto in poche parole “ we felt like a walking dollar sign as soon as we walked in”. E questa sensazione è costante, dal check al rientro in camera. 
Una sera uscendo l’insistenza sul sapere i nostri programmi del giorno dopo per poterci vendere un loro tour mi ha fatto talmente tanto innervosire che mi ha rovinato il resto della serata. 
Posso accettare questo comportamento ai venditori sulla strada, che stanno facendo il loro lavoro, ma non in hotel, dove dovrei sentirmi rilassata e a casa. 
Non c’è alcun vero interesse se non venderti qualcosa. 
Detto questo, che ho trovato di pessimo gusto per un hotel a 4 stelle altre cose non vanno bene. 
Non c’è l’acqua di cortesia, che c’è ovunque nello stato, e la televisione non andava, ma comunque erano una televisione che non dava possibilità alcuna di steaming per gli stranieri, quindi inutile. La piscina e bella ma con nessuno che controlla il pomeriggio è stata invasa da bambini urlanti, anche questo non ammissibile in un hotel di un certo livello. La colazione mediterranea quasi inesistente. 

Mi spiace molto per questa recensione, ma il “welcome to your home away from home” che dite all’ingresso è la bugia più grande che potreste dire prima di cercare di fregare i clienti appena entrano.

review.comment_positive: Nice hotel, good pool area and breakfast, excellent staff. The room was well appointed and a good size. Close enough to the old town.
review.comment_negative:
I booked this hotel based on so many reviews saying it was quiet. I accept that people’s sensitivity to noise varies and I am quite fussy, but I found the riverside room to be impacted by the road outside. This affected my stay here, however, my wife was not as bothered by it as me. So those less affected by noise can probably rest easily here. 
To be fair, I’m sure they would have moved us out the back of the hotel had I asked but i didn’t so it’s on me I guess. 
One other thing - getting an email from the property after checkout asking to give them a 10 in this review is wrong. The one and only purpose of a review is to be honest and allow those that come after you to make an informed decision.  Not a promotion of a business.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Với Cửa Sổ Lớn
review.comment_positive: I loved everything about the place! The staff were amazingly hospitable and welcoming and helped me with all my travel arrangements in Hoi An (local tour to the Coconut Village, transport to Danang etc) - Credit to Mr Chau, Mr Nam and the team for everything that they did for me. They also allowed me to see the rooms before checking in and if I can recommend go for the Super Deluxe Room - cozy and has a balcony that looks out to the river. The room was also tastefully appointed and the bed was one of the most comfortable that I have ever experienced (didn't want to leave the room!). The bath room was clean, well fitted and there was also a bath tub. Location could not have been better - just a mere 3-minute walk to the Ancient Town but you are still spared from the hustle and bustle and noise of the crowd. So convenient and you can also use their bicycles for free (available on a first come first serve basis but I was able to use it every time I wanted to). Wi-Fi is excellent. Can't really find any fault with the place really and it was definitely great value for money! I booked for one night initially but ended up staying for 2 nights since I was so pleased with the place! Do yourself a favour and stay here if you are ever in Hoi An or planning to come to Hoi An (which is an incredibly charming and lovely town full of colours and rich in history). Thanks for a great stay again Laluna Hoi An Riverside Hotel and Spa.
review.comment_negative: Perhaps the breakfast variety could be improved and maybe offer more choices for Vegetarian/Halal options.

review.comment_positive: 일단 가성비가 아주 좋았고 직원들 매우 친절했음. 수영장 크기가 약간 작았으나 예쁘고 깊이가 적당했음. 사람들 많지 않아서 거의 프라이빗 하게 이용했음. 올드타운과 거리 가까운 편. 비슷한 거리에서 이 정도 가성비 숙소 없는 듯 함. 숙소에 벌레 없이 깨끗했음. 조식 구성 괜찮았고 쌀국수 맛있었음. 스웨디시 마사지 최고였음.
review.comment_negative: 방에 들어갈 때 살짝 이질적인 냄새가 나고 특히 샤워부스에서 계속 약간의 악취가 올라왔음. 방 카드키를 하나만 주는데 나갈때 객실 전원이 내려가서 냉방이나 충전이 안 됨.

Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
El desayuno era muy completo, variado, muy bueno y en una franja horaria muy cómoda.
La ubicación es estupenda.
La cama es muy cómoda.
review.comment_negative:
Cuando estábamos intentando llegar desde el aeropuerto hasta el hotel, nos topamos con que el acceso estaba anegado porque el rio se había desbordado por las lluvias de lo largo del día, gracias al conductor del vehículo (grab) pudimos llegar porque estuvo preguntando y hablando con personal de otros hoteles y gente local que le fue dando indicaciones de como podria dejarnos en la puerta del hotel. Por parte de Laluna hotel no hubo ni aviso de que la llegada iba a estar inaccesible, ni ningún tipo de comunicación y creemos que para una persona que no conoce el lugar podrían haber estado más pendientes.
Luego el hotel tendría que recibir un poco de mantenimiento, la mirilla de la puerta (tapada con papel higiénico), las toallas (deshilachadas del uso), el aire acondicionado (hace bastante ruido) y el grifo del w.c perdía agua y de la noche que llegamos a la mañana siguiente se hizo un charco considerable en el baño (eso si, lo arreglaron enseguida).

review.comment_positive: We loved staying at Laluna. The hotel is clean, cozy and conveniently located near the old town of Hoi An. The breakfast is good and so are the set menu’s for dinner. The staff is friendly and helpful. The customer service is great; we had to check out very early and the staff prepared a breakfast box for us to take with us. Special shout out to Mr Nam, who was so very lovely.
review.comment_negative: I booked a nail appointment through the reception but unfortunately I wasn’t very happy with the job done by the stylist. She was very friendly but too rough with my nails. She damaged my nails and skin around it quite a bit. And the gel polish wasn’t done very nicely either. Quite some lumps on the nails and also some bleeding of the color outside of the nails. Not the hotel’s fault but I’d recommend going to a salon instead!

review.rating: Great location but poor noise control
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The staff at the hotel are amazingly helpful and really go above and beyond to ensure gusts enjoy their stay. They were very helpful in booking tours and shows (make sure to go to the Lune theatre!). The location is great and so close to everything. The rooms themselves are clean with comfortable bed and powerful shower.
review.comment_negative: There was quite a lot of noise during the night due to very thin walls and doors. Whenever a guest upstairs used the sink, shower or toilet in their room it would sound like water was running all around us - very loud and difficult to sleep. Whenever anyone would use the lift or talk in the hallway (which is quite a small area) it sounded like they were inside our room with us. We could even hear the sound of phone notifications from the guest in the room next to us. So although the bed in our room was comfortable, we really didn’t get much sleep for the five nights we stayed there.

Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Flussblick gebucht und es war genau so, wie es in der Beschreibung beschrieben war. Insgesamt war es toll, da das Hotel auch nicht direkt in der Partymeile ist aber fußläufig schnell zu erreichen ist.

review.rating: Outstanding room and service with unfortunately unstable Wifi.
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The room with the riverview was fabulous. I am a very poor sleeper but the bed was perfect and the noise level a lot lower than at your average hotel (even though my room faced a nightclub and was next to the elevator). The hotel is just a block off the main downtown area so the street leading there was rather quiet. The entire staff was outstanding in their service and often went above and beyond.
review.comment_negative:
If you need reliable internet for online meetings or because you need to watch Netflix every night then this place, unfortunately, might be a problem. I had to cancel meetings because the wifi would just not remain stable. The speed itself is theoretically ok with about 10Mb/s. 

The breakfast only lasted until 9:30 and a lot of items were already gone by 9. If you're a fellow night owl then you might have to skip it as I did a couple of times. The morning of my early departure I finally got to eat the popular breakfast Ban Ceo, lol. The coffee could be better, too. I got spoiled in town with amazing Vietnamese coffee. The restaurant itself does not really serve any Vietnamese dishes. You'll have to eat out at all times if you did not come to Vietnam to eat Pizza or Burgers ;).

review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est très beau, bien situé par rapport aux commerçants et quartiers. Le petit déjeuner est très correct. La chambre Suite donnant la vue rivière est spacieuse, confortable et dégage un certains charme rustique. Nous remercions le personnel qui est très souriant, aimable et professionnel. Un merci au manager Nam pour son enthousiasme et sa gentillesse,ainsi qu'aux autres membres de l'équipe ! Nous reviendrons avec plaisir à cet hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Adequate accommodation close to the action but some slip-ups by the hotel
review.room_type: Suite Giường Cỡ King Có Ban Công Và Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Good location, plenty of room, good bathroom.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast (included) was underwhelming and staff recommended a tour we took which was extremely poor value for money but clearly tied to the hotel. They did try and make it up to us but we felt as though we'd wasted both time and money, which left a bad taste.

review.rating: Next-level customer service, immaculate rooms, and great location. Highly recommend 10/10
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối Với Phòng Tắm - Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: My family and I received the best customer service we've ever received from any hotel (in Vietnam or back home in the United States). Mr. Chau at the front gave us a great introduction to the ancient city and a thorough explanation of the local delicacies and where to try them once we were checking in. He also helped us buy tickets to a show in Hoi An that my elderly father especially loved and wouldn't have known of had it not been for his recommendation. The staff at the hotel were all excellent. Every morning at breakfast at the hotel, we would have anywhere from 1-2 staff members (Mr. Chau and Mr. Nam) ask us how we were enjoying our stay and if there was anything they could improve on. They walked around to every table as well. The attention to detail overall is superb. Another example is there was one time I came back from strolling around town with my cousin, and one of the employees greeted me by my name. I was very pleasantly surprised and touched that someone had made the extra effort to remember me by name, and this employee had only shortly met me once at that point. The whole stay, we were cheerfully greeted by employees every where we went in the hotel. Excellent customer service aside, the breakfast food was yummy every morning, and the rooms are gorgeous. The rooms actually look better in person than in the photos. My parents and I got the connecting family rooms and they were lovely and spacious. The hotel is a super close walking distance to the old town as well. I chose this hotel because I especially wanted a special experience for my parents and relatives, and this was an excellent choice. We would all happily stay at this hotel again next time we visit Hoi An, and I would recommend this hotel without any hesitation. Continue the great work, and thank you for making this visit to Hoi An a special one for my family and I.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing I didn't like. Every staff member at the hotel was sincerely very pleasant and helpful. They all put in A+ effort, and the hotel itself is lovely and in a great location.

They showered our 85 year old mother with care and attention making her feel special and not a burden especially with her mobility challenges. 
The people more than make up for the little things like less than perfect faucets pointed out by other guests. You will not find gleaming marble foyers and fancy room amenities but you’ll find people who will go the extra mile for you with a smile.

review.comment_positive:
LALUNA was an excellent place to stay in HỘI An. It was very close to the action, but once you were in the hotel, it was very calm, quiet and relaxing. The staff were super friendly and helpful. They were able to help us organise activities and bookings within HỘI An and further afield for our plans beyond HỘI An. 
It was more expensive than some of the other hotels we had stayed in Vietnam, but the extra cost was definitely worth it for what you get. The buffet breakfast was amazing. The pool beautiful and relaxing.
I couldn’t recommend it more highly. 

We are a family of 2 adults and 3 kids (10, 7 and 6).

review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotel was just a walking distance to Hoi An Old Town where we had access to many quaint cafes and eateries. The hotel was beautiful and clean, with a lovely pool and poolside bar. However what we thoroughly enjoyed was the hospitality of the staff and we would like to personally thank Nancy. She gave us a warm welcome and whenever we needed anything such as recommendations for places to visit, buying tickets and booking transportation she assisted us and our whole trip went very smoothly and we got visit amazing places thanks to her and her team. She was very sweet towards our 3 year old daughter and that made everything worthwhile. Definitely will be back! 
Huge thanks from Audrey and family.

review.rating: Sehr schönes und sauberes Hotel in sehr guter Lage
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön und bestens ausgestattet. Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Blick auf dem Fluss und haben die letzten Stunden des Tages gerne auf den Balkon verbracht. Der Pool lädt zum entspannen ein und war eine gute Abwechslung zum Strand. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und bietet vietnamesische und „westliche“ Küche an. Die Altstadt ist ca. 10min zu Fuß erreichbar. Man kann kostenlos Fahrräder ausleihen. Der Strand ist ca. 4-5 KM entfernt. Es lohnt sich kurz über die Reisfelder zu fahren! Wir haben über das Hotel auch eine Fahrt mit den Coconut Booten gebucht. Der Fahrer war super freundlich und hat uns einiges über den Fluss und die Menschen in Hoi An erzählt. Das Personal am Hotel war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir können das Hotel wärmsten weiterempfehlen. Bei Interesse eines maßgeschneiderten Anzug können wir Tuong Tailor empfehlen. Wahnsinns Service & Qualität. Wer ein Tattoo stechen lassen will, können wir Dleetattoo empfehlen. Sehr sympathisches Pärchen mit unschlagbaren Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: מלון בוטיקי קטן וחמוד ממש קרוב למרכז הויאן (העיר העתיקה). החדרים היו סופר נקיים ומרווחים. הצוות היו פשוט מקסימים ודאגו לכל דבר שהיינו צריכים! ארוחת בוקר סבבה לגמרי יחסית לויאטנם

review.rating: Comfortable & spacious room, excellent service, perfect location
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Room - The hotel room was extremely comfortable and clean. It was spacious and well lit, with good WiFi. Water in the shower area/ bath tub was hot and it had strong force.

Service - Their service, across the board, was brilliant. Every member went out of their way to cater to our needs and make us feel at home. This is regardless of the time of the day. If something stands out, it really is their service.

Location - The hotel was strategically located. It was far from the noise but very close to the ancient town and all the happening places in the city. You could reach both of these within 10minutes (by foot).

review.comment_positive: La Luna is an excellent mid-size hotel close to the center of Hoi An.  The location is just off the main tourist center, so it's not affected by noise and crowds, but still close to everything important.  The staff were very helpful and friendly.  The rooms were beautifully decorated and comfortable.  The breakfast buffet had a broad offering of both Western and Vietnamese dishes.  La Luna could probably only be bettered by a five star luxury hotel which costs much more.

review.comment_positive:
La localisation proche de la vieille ville offre beaucoup d'opportunités de visites (et il y a énormément de choses à visiter dans cette magnifique ville)
Le personnel est sympathique et essaye toujours de vous satisfaire.
review.comment_negative:
Cet hôtel mériterait un sérieux rafraîchissement et une touche de modernité sans faire disparaitre le charme oriental pour autant.
Les douches pourraient être revues et surtout étanchées, les sols mériteraient un nettoyage en profondeur (notamment dans les salles d'eau).

La salle de restaurant nécessite une véritable décoration.
"Le chef" pourrait essayer de faire des efforts tant sur la qualité des plats que sur la présentation. Certaines viandes ne cuisent qu'une fois 🤨 !

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is very clean and beautifully decorated in french-indochine style. We loved our rooms which had a balcony to sit and admire the "river" in front of the hotel. The room is spacious, comfortable and very beautiful, and also very practical with enough space to place our 2 luggages, TV with hundreds of channels including 3 English movie channels, a glass jug to transfer the boiled water from the kettle, and very clean attached bathroom with strong water pressure.
The included breakfast was also very good with many choices of food. The hotel was near to Hoi An ancient town yet far enough from the noise. 
The staff was very friendly and helpful. 5-stars. 
I highly recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The room was lovely, overlooking the river and only a short walk to the old town. Mr Nam and the rest of the staff were lovely and friendly. The breakfast was good, a nice selection of fresh food. The pool was just the right temp and the beds were in the shade which I liked as the sun was intense when out. Laundry service was very efficient. I didn't even know that it had been returned as they had hung it all in the wardrobe.
review.comment_negative: The rooms weren't well insulated and the noise from the corridors and people showering was pretty loud. Maybe an idea would be to remove the tunes from the doors when they are opened as it sounds quite loud when people enter their rooms late at night.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối Với Phòng Tắm - Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We had a really good stay at Laluna - the location is great, in a quiet area just 5-10 min walk to the main attractions in the old town. Rooms are spacious, clean and more importantly the beds are really comfortable. The staff have been great, helping to arrange numerous tours/ transfers and constantly checking to see if we're having a good stay. Prices for the Spa, tours/ transfers, drinks etc. are more than reasonable too. All in all, you get an excellent value for money here and I would highly recommend staying at Laluna when in Hoi an.

review.rating: Nice hotel in a good location
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối Với Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
We stayed for 6 nights in the family connecting rooms with 3 young kids. The rooms aren’t really connecting but have a landing area that can be closed off so both front doors can be left open. Rooms are good size and comfortable. Our rooms both had balconies and one looked over the pool. 

Good location, easy to walk to restaurants and the old town. 

Staff are friendly and helpful. We had an issue with a baby cot on the first night but it was rectified the next day. 

Great pool area! Sunny all day. 
 
Nice food at the restaurant which can be eaten by the pool too. Varied selection at breakfast with eggs made to order.
review.comment_negative:
It is possible for kids to lock themselves inside their connecting room so not ideal for very young kids! You have to make sure you always have the key with you. 

As expected when staying at a hotel, food and transport booked through the hotel are expensive.

review.rating: Amazing hospitality by the staff and a great stay overall
review.room_type: Phòng Super Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công Và Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: A very quaint hotel located just minutes away from Hoi An Old Town. The staff were all amazing. Breakfast was good. Nothing bad about this place at all. Would recommend to everyone.
